ComicInfo.Summary:
The 17-Minute War: General Houston tells a captured Santa Anna why he attacked when he did.
I'll Remember You Yesterday: Joel travels to the future where he finds out all humans were killed a century earlier. Upon returning to his own time he finds a way to alter the future.
Alligator Alley: Amanda leads Tarka and his people through Alligator Alley.
The Mask of Medusa: Rona finds the fabled Mask of Medusa.
ComicInfo.Tags: Greece,Mordred,Athena,Texas,Medusa,Johnny Peril,Florida,Santa Anna,Madame Xanadu,Cynthia,Abel,Mildred,The Three Witches
